group_1.textRight: [chara:800500:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]This is incredibleâ€¦!
So you found this bangle buried near@the shrine?!

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Yuta! You can check it out all@you want later.

group_1.textRight: Oh, right...
Say, it looks like Momoko didn't come.

group_1.textLeft: Well...she's not feeling like herself.@She's resting in our room.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see...
Did she get heat stroke while you guys were@checking out the shrine and monument?

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps...[chara:101701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101701:cheek_0][chara:101701:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json][chara:101701:lipSynch_1]but it was worth it.

group_1.textRight: Right, you got this bangle!

group_1.textLeft: Well...we found some other information@aside from that.
The Diviner survived the shipwreck and@returned to the village.
There, she awaited the sailor, firm in her@belief that he survived, too.

group_1.textRight: That's not what the legend says, though...@How on earth did you figure this out?

group_1.textLeft: We'll explain once we get it all solved.
For now, though, there are some things@we want to discuss.
The boat that the Diviner and sailor used to elope@was wrecked off the coast of the village, correct?

group_1.textRight: If you're asking if the original is still intact,@I think that would be unlikely.
It was probably just a small boat, after all.
Whatever the circumstances behind it sinking,@there's likely no trace of it left...

group_1.textLeft: That's not good!
We want to locate the ship that the@Diviner was on...

group_1.textRight: In terms of what may be on the ocean floor,
that foreign trade ship that was mentioned@in the village archives is likely still there.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you mean that ship that may have@been blended into the fairy tale...?

group_1.textRight: Like I said, it's a bit excessive for a Diviner@and a sailor's elopement.
Furthermore, it likely sank some years@after that event...
Still, it's a big ship. We may have a chance@of finding it.

group_1.textLeft: ...W-wait a minute!
So the Diviner ran away with a sailor from a trade@ship that stopped by the village, but the elopement@failed...
She washed up in this village again,@and waited for him.
But if there was a second trade ship that came@to the village, after that elopement...
Then it's possible the sailor survived...
...and that he came back to the village@to reunite with the Diviner!

group_1.textRight: Whether they were able to reunite is@beyond me...
But it's certainly not impossible that@the sailor could have come back.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh! I feel like a great detective...!
Then if we find that sunken ship...
Perhaps we can determine it was a trade ship,@and that the sailor was on board?

group_1.textRight: It's hard to say...but I think we can at least@determine how old it was.
If we can prove that the sailor survived,
then that would be a major blow against the idea@that the Diviner was punished by the gods!

group_1.textLeft: But we still have no idea where the trade@ship sank...
Oh?

group_1.textRight: I've brought you all some iced barley tea.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, ma'am.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I brought one too many...

group_1.textLeft: Momoko is in the next room.@Can you leave it there for her?

group_1.textRight: The door to your room was actually open.@I checked on it before closing it...
But there was no one in the room.

group_1.textLeft: What? You can't be serious...!
Momoko!

group_1.textRight: It looks like she really did leave...

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what...? Where could she have gone?!

group_1.textRight: Perhaps she woke up and went for a walk?

group_1.textLeft: But she left her phone behind...
(No, stop...@Why do I have such a terrible feeling...?)
